languages.text: "Ложь! Ты видел их тела?! Кто из братьев будет свидетелем, что эти слова истинны?!"
"Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"
languages.original_text: "Ложь! Ты видел их тела?! Кто из братьев будет свидетелем, что эти слова истинны?!"

traits.locale_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你撒谎！你看到他们的尸体了吗？哪个兄弟能为你作证？”
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: “你撒谎！你看到他们的尸体了吗？哪个兄弟能为你作证？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「嘘だ！アイツらの遺体を見たのか？こんな言葉が真実だと、同胞の誰が認める？」
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘だ！アイツらの遺体を見たのか？こんな言葉が真実だと、同胞の誰が認める？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Eso es mentira! ¿Visteis los cadáveres? ¿Algún hermano da fe de la veracidad de esas palabras?».
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso es mentira! ¿Visteis los cadáveres? ¿Algún hermano da fe de la veracidad de esas palabras?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Mensonges ! As-tu vu leurs corps ? Lequel d'entre vous se portera garant de la vérité de ces paroles ? »
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: « Mensonges ! As-tu vu leurs corps ? Lequel d'entre vous se portera garant de la vérité de ces paroles ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Lügen! Habt Ihr ihre Leichen gesehen? Welcher Bruder kann die Wahrheit dieser Worte beschwören?"
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: "Lügen! Habt Ihr ihre Leichen gesehen? Welcher Bruder kann die Wahrheit dieser Worte beschwören?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yalan! Cesetlerini gördün mü? Bu sözlerin doğruluğunu hangi kardeşimiz tasdik edecek?"
languages.original_text: "Lies! Did you see their bodies? Which of the brothers will avow the truth of these words?"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan! Bedenlerini gördün mü? Bu sözlerin doğruluğunu hangi kardeşim tasdik edecek?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
